thread.title: European stocks jump on Greek bailout news
thread.title_full: European stocks jump on Greek bailout news

title: European stocks jump on Greek bailout news
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Jul 13, 2015, 09:34 BST - UK Markets close in 6 hrs 56 mins European stocks jump on Greek bailout news AFP – 19 minutes ago View Photo 

European stock markets rallied at the start of trading on Monday after news that eurozone leaders had reached a unanimous deal to offer Greece a third bailout. 
Frankfurt's benchmark DAX 30 index of top companies advanced 1.53 percent to 11,489.17 and the CAC 40 in Paris rose 1.67 percent to 4,985.14. 
Outside the eurozone, London's FTSE 100 added 0.94 percent to 6,736.22 points, compared with Friday's closing level. Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
